thread.title: After Troubled AIG, a Maiden Lane Tower Shifts to Consumer Debt Relief

author: Keiko Morris
title: After Troubled AIG, a Maiden Lane Tower Shifts to Consumer Debt Relief
text:
Talk about flipping the script.
The office tower at 180 Maiden Lane, a 1.2 million-square-foot building in downtown Manhattan that once housed insurance giant American International Group Inc., is getting a new tenant: consumer-debt resolution company National Debt Relief.
The property is a short stroll from 33 Maiden Lane, a building owned...
